Nerangs.ab: fradaϑāi ahurahe mazdāi raēuuatō xvarənaŋuhatō ... spəṇtahe mainiiə̄uš dāmanąm aṣ̌aonąm pad harw fradaθāi abarhāwan čahār angust bē abrāzišn ēdōn kū pad panǰ fradaϑāi gōš bālā dast abar dārēd pad dāmanąm aṣ̌aonąm abarhāwan ō ī dar ī hāwan nihišn

"fradaϑāi ahurahe mazdāi raēuuatō xvarənaŋuhatō ... spəṇtahe mainiiə̄uš dāmanąm aṣ̌aonąm At each fradaϑāi he has to raise the abarhāwan four finger so that at the fifth one he holds the hand to the height of his ears. At dāmanąm aṣ̌aonąm, he has to hit the edge of the hāwan with the abarhāwan."
